sentences.sContent: Abettors, who instigate others to commit crimes, are not only the instigators but also the disseminator of criminal intent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Abettors, who instigate others to commit crimes, are not only the instigators but also the disseminator of criminal intent.
sentences.sCn: 教唆犯作为教唆他人犯罪的人，不仅是犯意的挑起者，也是犯意的传播者。

sentences.sContent: This paper can be divided into four parts. The first part briefly outlines the previous achievements on"instigate the lawsuits".
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper can be divided into four parts. The first part briefly outlines the previous achievements on"instigate the lawsuits".
sentences.sCn: 本文分为四部分，第一部分对有关“教唆词讼”的先行研究作了一个简要的概述。

remMethod.val: in + stig (看作sting ， 刺) + ate (做…) → 刺激年轻人做 → 教唆
